question: Choose the correct verb: She ____ to school daily. (Answer in one word. Answer in English.)

explanation: "Easy" is the antonym of "difficult".

question: Complete: He ____ to the party yesterday. (Answer in one word. Answer in English.)

question: Write one word meaning enough. (Answer in one word. Answer in English.)
